attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the number of dentists opting out of the NHS, there is no option for OAPs but to pay for their dental treatment at exhorbitant costs, which we cannot afford. Therefore I submit that all OAPS earning pensions less than £15,000 pa should be provided with FREE DENTAL treatment. To this end the NHS should set up NHS DENTAL DIRECT to cater for OAPs

rejection.details: The title of a petition needs to ask for a specific action. Please reword.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
